_header: The world with is fared [Þe werd with is faired]
_description: ‘Quatuor tortores hominis in mundo’, a tag from the Castell of Love (5131) — eight lines (abababab) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Þe werd with is fairedÞat benemet man is
                    sith…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Þe deuel with is leþeredÞat hem alle togidre
                    knith
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 28.
